   16: -module(ejabberdctl_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -import(ejabberdctl_helper, [ejabberdctl/3, rpc_call/3]).
   25: -import(mongoose_helper, [auth_modules/0]).
   26: 
   27: -define(SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR, $\').
   28: -define(DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR, $\").
   29: 
   30: -record(offline_msg, {us, timestamp, expire, from, to, packet}).
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% Suite configuration
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     AuthMods = auth_modules(),
   38:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   39:         true ->
   40:             {skip, external_auth_not_supported};
   41:         false ->
   42:             [{group, accounts},
   43:              {group, sessions},
   44:              {group, vcard},
   45:              {group, roster},
   46:              {group, roster_advanced},
   47:              {group, last},
   48:              {group, private},
   49:              {group, stanza},
   50:              {group, stats},
   51:              {group, basic}]
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: groups() ->
   55:      [{accounts, [sequence], accounts()},
   56:       {sessions, [sequence], sessions()},
   57:       {vcard, [sequence], vcard()},
   58:       {roster, [sequence], roster()},
   59:       {last, [sequence], last()},
   60:       {private, [sequence], private()},
   61:       {stanza, [sequence], stanza()},
   62:       {roster_advanced, [sequence], roster_advanced()},
   63:       {basic, [sequence], basic()},
   64:       {stats, [sequence], stats()}].
   65: 
   66: basic() ->
   67:     [simple_register, simple_unregister, register_twice,
   68:         backup_restore_mnesia,
   69:         restore_mnesia_wrong,
   70:         dump_and_load,
   71:         load_mnesia_wrong,
   72:         dump_table,
   73:         get_loglevel,
   74:         remove_old_messages_test,
   75:         remove_expired_messages_test
   76:     ].
   77: 
   78: accounts() -> [change_password, check_password_hash, check_password,
   79:                check_account, ban_account, num_active_users, delete_old_users,
   80:                delete_old_users_vhost].
   81: 
   82: sessions() -> [num_resources_num, kick_session, status,
   83:                sessions_info, set_presence].
   84: 
   85: vcard() -> [vcard_rw, vcard2_rw, vcard2_multi_rw].
   86: 
   87: roster() -> [rosteritem_rw, presence_after_add_rosteritem,
   88:              push_roster,
   89:              push_roster_all,
   90:              push_roster_alltoall].
   91: 
   92: roster_advanced() ->[process_rosteritems_list_simple,
   93:                           process_rosteritems_list_nomatch,
   94:                           process_rosteritems_list_advanced1,
   95:                           process_rosteritems_list_advanced2,
   96:                           process_rosteritems_delete_advanced,
   97:                           process_rosteritems_delete_advanced2].
   98: 
   99: last() -> [set_last].
  100: 
  101: private() -> [private_rw].
  102: 
  103: stanza() -> [send_message, send_message_wrong_jid, send_stanza, send_stanzac2s_wrong].
  104: 
  105: stats() -> [stats_global, stats_host].
  106: 
  107: suite() ->
  108:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
  109: 
  110: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  111:     {ok, EjdWD} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(file, get_cwd, []),
  112:     Cwd0 = escalus_config:get_config(data_dir, Config),
  113:     CwdTokens = string:tokens(Cwd0, "/"),
  114:     Cwd =  [$/ | string:join(lists:sublist(CwdTokens, 1, length(CwdTokens)-2), "/")],
  115:     TemplatePath = Cwd ++ "/roster.template",
  116:     start_mod_admin_extra(),
  117:     CtlPath = case filelib:is_file(EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl") of
  118:                   true -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/ejabberdctl";
  119:                   false -> EjdWD ++ "/bin/mongooseimctl"
  120:               end,
  121: 
  122:     AuthMods = auth_modules(),
  123: 
  124:     NewConfig = escalus:init_per_suite([{ctl_path, CtlPath},
  125:                                         {ctl_auth_mods, AuthMods},
  126:                                         {roster_template, TemplatePath} | Config]),
  127:     escalus:create_users(NewConfig, {by_name, [alice, mike, bob, kate]}).
  128: 
  129: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  130:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  131:     delete_users(Config1),
  132:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config1).
  133: 
  134: init_per_group(vcard, Config) ->
  135:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod,get_module_opt,
  136:                               [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  137:                                mod_vcard, backend, mnesia]) of
  138:         ldap ->
  139:             {skip, vcard_set_not_supported_with_ldap};
  140:         _ ->
  141:             Config
  142:     end;
  143: 
  144: init_per_group(roster_advanced, Config) ->
  145:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod,get_module_opt,[ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain), mod_roster, backend, mnesia]) of
  146:         mnesia ->
  147:             Config;
  148:         _ ->
  149:             {skip, command_process_rosteritems_supports_only_mnesia}
  150:     end;
  151: 
  152: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  153:     Config.
  154: 
  155: end_per_group(Rosters, Config) when (Rosters == roster) or (Rosters == roster_advanced) ->
  156:     TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  157:     RegUsers = [atom_to_list(U) || {U, _} <- escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config)],
  158:     {ok, [Roster]} = file:consult(TemplatePath),
  159:     io:format("Roster is ~p~n and registred is ~p",[Roster, RegUsers]),
  160:     C = fun({U, S, _, _}) ->
  161:         case lists:member(U, RegUsers) of
  162:             true ->
  163:                 SB = string_to_binary(S),
  164:                 UB = string_to_binary(U),
  165:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_hooks, run, [remove_user, SB, [UB, SB]]);
  166:             _ ->
  167:                ok
  168:         end
  169:     end,
  170:     lists:foreach(C, Roster),
  171:     Config;
  172: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  173:     Config.
  174: 
  175: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  176:   % these cases are incompatible with domainless odbc schema
  177:   when CaseName == delete_old_users_vhost
  178:        orelse CaseName == stats_global
  179:        orelse CaseName == stats_host ->
  180:     {_, AuthMods} = lists:keyfind(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  181:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_odbc, AuthMods) orelse
  182:          lists:member(ejabberd_auth_ldap, AuthMods) of
  183:         true -> {skip, vhost_odbc_incompatible};
  184:         false -> escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  185:     end;
  186: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  187:     when CaseName == check_password_hash;
  188:          CaseName == delete_old_users ->
  189:     {_, AuthMods} = lists:keyfind(ctl_auth_mods, 1, Config),
  190:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_ldap, AuthMods) of
  191:         true -> {skip, not_fully_supported_with_ldap};
  192:         false -> escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config)
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  195:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  196: 
  197: end_per_testcase(delete_old_users, Config) ->
  198:     Users = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice, bob, kate, mike]}),
  199:     lists:foreach(fun({_User, UserSpec}) ->
  200:                 {Username, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(UserSpec, Config),
  201:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, try_register, [Username, Domain, Pass])
  202:         end, Users),
  203:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config),
  204:     escalus:end_per_testcase(delete_old_users, Config);
  205: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  206:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config),
  207:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  208: 
  209: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  210: %% mod_admin_extra_accounts tests
  211: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  212: 
  213: change_password(Config) ->
  214:     {User, Domain, OldPassword} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  215:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, <<OldPassword/binary, $2>>], Config),
  216:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, _}} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, alice, <<"newres">>),
  217:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, OldPassword], Config),
  218:     {ok, _Alice2} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, alice, <<"newres2">>).
  219: 
  220: check_password_hash(Config) ->
  221:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  222:     MD5Hash = get_md5(Pass),
  223:     MD5HashBad = get_md5(<<Pass/binary, "bad">>),
  224:     SHAHash = get_sha(Pass),
  225: 
  226:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, MD5Hash, "md5"], Config),
  227:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, MD5HashBad, "md5"], Config),
  228:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0), %% Must return code other than 0
  229:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password_hash", [User, Domain, SHAHash, "sha"], Config).
  230: 
  231: check_password(Config) ->
  232:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  233: 
  234:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_password", [User, Domain, Pass], Config),
  235:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_password", [User, Domain, <<Pass/binary, "Bad">>], Config),
  236:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  237: 
  238: check_account(Config) ->
  239:     {User, Domain, _Pass} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  240: 
  241:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [User, Domain], Config),
  242:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [<<User/binary, "Bad">>, Domain], Config),
  243:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  244: 
  245: ban_account(Config) ->
  246:     {User, Domain, Pass} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  247: 
  248:     {ok, Mike} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, mike, <<"newres">>),
  249:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("ban_account", [User, Domain, "SomeReason"], Config),
  250:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"conflict">>, <<"SomeReason">>], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Mike)),
  251:     {error, {connection_step_failed, _, _}} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, mike, <<"newres2">>),
  252:     ejabberdctl("change_password", [User, Domain, Pass], Config).
  253: 
  254: num_active_users(Config) ->
  255:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  256:     {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  257: 
  258:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  259:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  260:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now),
  261:     set_last(MikeName, Domain, Now - 864000), %% Now - 10 days
  262:     {"1\n", _} = ejabberdctl("num_active_users", [Domain, "5"], Config).
  263: 
  264: delete_old_users(Config) ->
  265:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  266:     {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  267:     {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  268:     {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  269: 
  270:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  271:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  272:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now),
  273:     set_last(BobName, Domain, Now),
  274:     set_last(MikeName, Domain, Now),
  275: 
  276:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_users", ["10"], Config),
  277:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  278:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, Domain], Config),
  279:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  280: 
  281: delete_old_users_vhost(Config) ->
  282:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  283:     {KateName, Domain, KatePass} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  284:     SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  285: 
  286:     {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  287:     Now = Mega*1000000+Secs,
  288:     set_last(AliceName, Domain, Now-86400*30),
  289: 
  290:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [KateName, SecDomain, KatePass], Config),
  291:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, SecDomain], Config),
  292:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_users_vhost", [SecDomain, "10"], Config),
  293:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  294:     {_, ErrCode} = ejabberdctl("check_account", [KateName, SecDomain], Config),
  295:     true = (ErrCode =/= 0). %% Must return code other than 0
  296: 
  297: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  298: %% mod_admin_extra_accounts tests
  299: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  300: 
  301: %% Checks both num_resources and resource_num
  302: num_resources_num(Config) ->
  303:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 3}, {bob, 1}], fun(_, Alice2, _, _) ->
  304:                 {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  305:                 ResName = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(Alice2)) ++ "\n",
  306: 
  307:                 {"3\n", _} = ejabberdctl("num_resources", [Username, Domain], Config),
  308:                 {ResName, _} = ejabberdctl("resource_num", [Username, Domain, "2"], Config)
  309:         end).
  310: 
  311: kick_session(Config) ->
  312:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  313:                 Username = escalus_client:username(Alice),
  314:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  315:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  316: 
  317:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("kick_session", [Username, Domain, Resource, "\"Because I can!\""], Config),
  318:                 Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  319:                 escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"conflict">>, <<"Because I can!">>], Stanza)
  320:         end).
  321: 
  322: status(Config) ->
  323:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(User1, User2, User3) ->
  324:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(User1),
  325:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  326:                 AwayPresence = escalus_stanza:presence_show(<<"away">>),
  327:                 escalus_client:send(User2, AwayPresence),
  328: 
  329:                 {"2\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num", ["available"], Config),
  330: 
  331:                 {"2\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num_host", [PriDomain, "available"], Config),
  332:                 {"0\n", _} = ejabberdctl("status_num_host", [SecDomain, "available"], Config),
  333: 
  334:                 {StatusList, _} = ejabberdctl("status_list", ["available"], Config),
  335:                 match_user_status([User1, User3], StatusList),
  336: 
  337:                 {StatusList2, _} = ejabberdctl("status_list_host", [PriDomain, "available"], Config),
  338:                 match_user_status([User1, User3], StatusList2),
  339:                 {[], _} = ejabberdctl("status_list_host", [SecDomain, "available"], Config)
  340:         end).
  341: 
  342: sessions_info(Config) ->
  343:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(User1, User2, User3) ->
  344:                 Username1 = escalus_client:username(User1),
  345:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(User1),
  346:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  347:                 AwayPresence = escalus_stanza:presence_show(<<"away">>),
  348:                 escalus_client:send(User2, AwayPresence),
  349: 
  350:                 {UserList, _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_info", [], Config),
  351:                 match_user_info([User1, User2, User3], UserList),
  352: 
  353:                 {UserList2, _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_vhost", [PriDomain], Config),
  354:                 match_user_info([User1, User2, User3], UserList2),
  355:                 {[], _} = ejabberdctl("connected_users_vhost", [SecDomain], Config),
  356: 
  357:                 {UserList3, _} = ejabberdctl("user_sessions_info", [Username1, PriDomain], Config),
  358:                 match_user_info([User1], UserList3)
  359:         end).
  360: 
  361: set_presence(Config) ->
  362:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  363:                 Username = escalus_client:username(Alice),
  364:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  365:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  366: 
  367:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_presence", [Username, Domain, Resource,
  368:                                                       "available", "away", "mystatus", "10"], Config),
  369:                 Presence = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  370:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_show, [<<"away">>], Presence),
  371:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_status, [<<"mystatus">>], Presence),
  372:                 escalus:assert(is_presence_with_priority, [<<"10">>], Presence)
  373:         end).
  374: 
  375: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  376: %% mod_admin_extra_vcard tests
  377: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  378: 
  379: vcard_rw(Config) ->
  380:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  381: 
  382:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME"], Config),
  383:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  384: 
  385:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME", "SomeNickname"], Config),
  386:     {"SomeNickname\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard", [Username, Domain, "NICKNAME"], Config).
  387: 
  388: vcard2_rw(Config) ->
  389:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  390: 
  391:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME"], Config),
  392:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  393: 
  394:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME", "ESL"], Config),
  395:     {"ESL\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGNAME"], Config).
  396: 
  397: vcard2_multi_rw(Config) ->
  398:     {Username, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  399: 
  400:     {_, ExitCode} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT"], Config),
  401:     true = (ExitCode /= 0),
  402: 
  403:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT", "'sales;marketing'"], Config),
  404:     {OrgUnits0, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_vcard2_multi", [Username, Domain, "ORG", "ORGUNIT"], Config),
  405:     OrgUnits = string:tokens(OrgUnits0, "\n"),
  406:     2 = length(OrgUnits),
  407:     true = (lists:member("sales", OrgUnits) andalso lists:member("marketing", OrgUnits)).
  408: 
  409: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  410: %% mod_admin_extra_vcard tests
  411: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  412: 
  413: rosteritem_rw(Config) ->
  414:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  415:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  416:                 {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  417:                 {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  418: 
  419:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  420:                                                         Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  421:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  422:                                                         Domain, "\"My Mike\"", "\'My Group\'", "both"], Config),
  423: 
  424:                 [Push1, Push2] = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2), % Check roster broadcasts
  425:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push1),
  426:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Push1),
  427:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push2),
  428:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Push2),
  429: 
  430:                 {Items1, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_roster", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  431:                 match_roster([{BobName, Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"},
  432:                               {MikeName, Domain, "MyMike", "MyGroup", "both"}], Items1),
  433: 
  434:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  435:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  436:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  437:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  438:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Roster1),
  439: 
  440:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config),
  441: 
  442:                 Push3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  443:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_set, Push3),
  444:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Push3),
  445: 
  446:                 {Items2, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_roster", [AliceName, Domain], Config),
  447:                 match_roster([{MikeName, Domain, "MyMike", "MyGroup", "both"}], Items2),
  448: 
  449:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(mike))  % cleanup
  450:         end).
  451: 
  452: presence_after_add_rosteritem(Config) ->
  453:      escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  454:                  {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  455:                  {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  456: 
  457:                  {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  458:                                                          Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  459: 
  460:                  escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  461:                  escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  462: 
  463:                  escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob))  % cleanup
  464:          end).
  465: 
  466: push_roster(Config) ->
  467:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  468:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  469:                 TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  470: 
  471:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster", [TemplatePath, AliceName, Domain], Config),
  472:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  473:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  474:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  475:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  476: 
  477:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob)) % cleanup
  478:         end).
  479: 
  480: process_rosteritems_list_simple(Config) ->
  481:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  482:         %% given
  483:         Action = "list",
  484:         Subs = "any",
  485:         Asks = "any",
  486:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  487:         Contact =string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  488:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  489:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  490:         %% when
  491:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  492:         S = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  493:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, Contact], Config),
  494:         %% then
  495:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++Contact++".*"),
  496:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config)
  497:     end).
  498: 
  499: process_rosteritems_list_nomatch(Config) ->
  500:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  501:         %% given
  502:         Action = "list",
  503:         Subs = "from:both",
  504:         Asks = "any",
  505:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  506:         Contact =string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  507:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  508:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  509:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  510:                                                 Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  511:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  512:         %% when
  513:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, Contact], Config),
  514:         %% then
  515:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++Contact++".*"),
  516:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config)
  517:     end).
  518: 
  519: process_rosteritems_list_advanced1(Config) ->
  520:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  521:         %% given
  522:         Action = "list",
  523:         Subs = "from:both",
  524:         Asks = "any",
  525:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  526:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  527:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  528:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  529:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  530:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  531:         ContactsRegexp = ContactMike ++ ":" ++ string:substr(binary_to_list(KateName), 1, 2) ++ ".*@.*",
  532: 
  533:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  534:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  535:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  536:                                                 Domain, "BestFriend", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  537:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  538:         %% when
  539:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  540:         %% then
  541:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  542:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  543:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  544:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  545:     end).
  546: 
  547: process_rosteritems_delete_advanced(Config) ->
  548:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  549:         %% given
  550:         Action = "delete",
  551:         Subs = "from",
  552:         Asks = "any",
  553:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  554:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  555:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  556:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  557:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  558:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  559:         ContactsRegexp = ".*" ++ string:substr(ContactMike, 3) ++
  560:                            ":" ++ string:substr(ContactKate, 1,2) ++"@" ++ binary_to_list(Domain),
  561:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  562:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  563:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  564:                                                 Domain, "Friend", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  565:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  566:         %% when
  567:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  568:         %% then
  569:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  570:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  571:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  572:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  573:     end).
  574: 
  575: process_rosteritems_list_advanced2(Config) ->
  576:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Mike, Kate) ->
  577:         %% given
  578:         Action = "list",
  579:         Subs = "any",
  580:         Asks = "any",
  581:         User = escalus_client:short_jid(Alice),
  582:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  583:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  584:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  585:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  586:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  587:         ContactsRegexp = ".*e@lo.*",
  588:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  589:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  590:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  591:                                                 Domain, "KateFromSchool", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  592:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  593:         %% when
  594:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsRegexp], Config),
  595:         %% then
  596:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactMike++".*"),
  597:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*"++ContactKate++".*"),
  598:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  599:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config)
  600:     end).
  601: 
  602: process_rosteritems_delete_advanced2(Config) ->
  603:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {mike, 1}, {kate, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob, Mike, Kate) ->
  604:         %% given
  605:         Action = "delete",
  606:         Subs = "to:from",
  607:         Asks = "any",
  608:         User = "'al.c[e]@.*host:((b[o]b)|(mike))@loc.*t2'",
  609:         {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  610:         {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  611:         {MikeName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(mike, Config),
  612:         {KateName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(kate, Config),
  613:         ContactMike = string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Mike))),
  614:         ContactKate= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Kate))),
  615:         ContactBob= string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))),
  616:         ContactsReg = "'.ik[ea]@localho+.*:k@loc.*st:(alice)+@.*:no'",
  617:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName,
  618:                                                 Domain, "DearMike", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  619:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName,
  620:                                                 Domain, "HateHerSheHasSoNiceLegs", "MyGroup", "to"], Config),
  621:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName,
  622:                                                 Domain, "Girlfriend", "MyGroup", "from"], Config),
  623:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice,4),
  624:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
  625:         %% when
  626:         {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("process_rosteritems", [Action, Subs, Asks, User, ContactsReg], Config),
  627:         %% then
  628:         {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactMike ++ ".*"),
  629:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactKate ++ ".*"),
  630:         nomatch = re:run(R, ".*Matches:.*" ++ ContactBob ++ ".*"),
  631:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, MikeName, Domain], Config),
  632:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, KateName, Domain], Config),
  633:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName, Domain], Config)
  634:     end).
  635: 
  636: push_roster_all(Config) ->
  637:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  638:                 TemplatePath = escalus_config:get_config(roster_template, Config),
  639: 
  640:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster_all", [TemplatePath], Config),
  641: 
  642:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  643:                 Roster1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  644:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster1),
  645:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster1),
  646: 
  647:                 escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  648:                 Roster2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  649:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster2),
  650:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [alice], Roster2),
  651: 
  652:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(bob)), % cleanup
  653:                 escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:roster_remove_contact(alice)) % cleanup
  654:         end).
  655: 
  656: push_roster_alltoall(Config) ->
  657:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  658:                 {_, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  659: 
  660:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("push_roster_alltoall", [Domain, "MyGroup"], Config),
  661: 
  662:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  663:                 Roster = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  664: 
  665:                 escalus:assert(is_roster_result, Roster),
  666:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [bob], Roster),
  667:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [mike], Roster),
  668:                 escalus:assert(roster_contains, [kate], Roster)
  669:         end).
  670: 
  671: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  672: %% mod_admin_extra_last tests
  673: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  674: 
  675: set_last(Config) ->
  676:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  677:                 {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  678:                 {BobName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  679: 
  680:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName,
  681:                                                         Domain, "MyBob", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  682:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("add_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName,
  683:                                                         Domain, "MyAlice", "MyGroup", "both"], Config),
  684: 
  685:                 escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), % ignore push
  686: 
  687:                 {Mega, Secs, _} = erlang:now(),
  688:                 TS = integer_to_list(Mega*1000000+Secs-7200),
  689: 
  690:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("set_last", [BobName, Domain, TS, "Status"], Config),
  691: 
  692:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:last_activity(bob)),
  693:                 LastAct = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  694:                 escalus:assert(is_last_result, LastAct),
  695:                 Seconds = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(
  696:                             exml_query:path(LastAct, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"seconds">>}]))),
  697:                 true = ( (Seconds > 7100) andalso (Seconds < 7300) ),
  698: 
  699:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [AliceName, Domain, BobName, Domain], Config), % cleanup
  700:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_rosteritem", [BobName, Domain, AliceName, Domain], Config)
  701:         end).
  702: 
  703: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  704: %% mod_admin_extra_private tests
  705: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: 
  707: private_rw(Config) ->
  708:     {AliceName, Domain, _} = get_user_data(alice, Config),
  709:     XmlEl1 = "'<secretinfo xmlns=\"nejmspejs\">1</secretinfo>'",
  710:     XmlEl2 = "'<secretinfo xmlns=\"inny\">2</secretinfo>'",
  711: 
  712:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_set", [AliceName, Domain, XmlEl1], Config),
  713:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_set", [AliceName, Domain, XmlEl2], Config),
  714: 
  715:     {Result, 0} = ejabberdctl("private_get", [AliceName, Domain, "secretinfo", "nejmspejs"], Config),
  716:     {ok, #xmlel{ name = <<"secretinfo">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"nejmspejs">>}],
  717:                 children = [#xmlcdata{ content = <<"1">> }]}} = exml:parse(list_to_binary(Result)).
  718: 
  719: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  720: %% mod_admin_extra_stanza tests
  721: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  722: 
  723: send_message(Config) ->
  724:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 2}], fun(Alice, Bob1, Bob2) ->
  725:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_message_chat", [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  726:                                                            escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  727:                                                            "\"Hi Bob!\""], Config),
  728:                 Stanza1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob1),
  729:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi Bob!">>], Stanza1),
  730: 
  731:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_message_headline", [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  732:                                                                     escalus_client:short_jid(Bob1),
  733:                                                                     "Subj", "\"Hi Bob!!\""], Config),
  734:                 Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob1),
  735:                 Stanza3 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob2),
  736:                 escalus:assert(is_headline_message, [<<"Subj">>, <<"Hi Bob!!">>], Stanza2),
  737:                 escalus:assert(is_headline_message, [<<"Subj">>, <<"Hi Bob!!">>], Stanza3)
  738:         end).
  739: 
  740: send_message_wrong_jid(Config) ->
  741:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  742:         {_, Err1} = ejabberdctl("send_message_chat", ["'@@#$%!!.§§£'",
  743:                                                    escalus_client:full_jid(Bob),
  744:                                                    "\"Hello bobby!\""], Config),
  745:         {_, Err2} = ejabberdctl("send_message_headline", ["'%%@&@&@==//\///'",
  746:                                                        escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  747:                                                        "Subj", "\"Are
  748:                                                        you there?\""],
  749:                              Config),
  750:         Err1 =/=0,
  751:         Err2 =/=0,
  752:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  753:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob)
  754:     end).
  755: 
  756: send_stanza(Config) ->
  757:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  758:                 Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  759:                 Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  760:                 {BobName, _, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  761:                 BobJID = <<BobName/binary, $@, Domain/binary, $/, (escalus_client:resource(Bob))/binary>>,
  762: 
  763:                 Stanza = re:replace(exml:to_binary(escalus_stanza:from(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, "Hi"), BobJID)),
  764:                                     <<?DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, <<?SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, [global, {return, binary}]),
  765:                 {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [BobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", Stanza/binary, $\">>], Config),
  766: 
  767:                 Message = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  768:                 escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi">>], Message),
  769:                 escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Bob], Message)
  770:         end).
  771: 
  772: send_stanzac2s_wrong(Config) ->
  773:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  774:         Domain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  775:         Resource = escalus_client:resource(Alice),
  776:         WrongBobName = "bobby_the_great",
  777:         {BobName, _, _} = get_user_data(bob, Config),
  778:         BobJID = <<BobName/binary, $@, Domain/binary, $/, (escalus_client:resource(Bob))/binary>>,
  779:         Stanza = re:replace(exml:to_binary(escalus_stanza:from(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, "Hi"), BobJID)),
  780:                             <<?DOUBLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, <<?SINGLE_QUOTE_CHAR>>, [global, {return, binary}]),
  781:         StanzaWrong = <<"<iq type='get' id='234234'><xmlns='wrongwrong'>">>,
  782:         {_, Err} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [WrongBobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", Stanza/binary, $\">>],
  783:                                Config),
  784:         {_, Err2} = ejabberdctl("send_stanza_c2s", [BobName, Domain, Resource, <<$\", StanzaWrong/binary, $\">>],
  785:                                Config),
  786: 
  787:         Err =/= 0,
  788:         Err2 =/= 0,
  789:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
  790:     end).
  791: 
  792: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  793: %% mod_admin_extra_stats tests
  794: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  795: 
  796: stats_global(Config) ->
  797:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(_Alice, _Bob) ->
  798:                 RegisteredCount = length(escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config, [])),
  799:                 Registered = integer_to_list(RegisteredCount) ++ "\n",
  800: 
  801:                 {UpTime, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["uptimeseconds"], Config),
  802:                 _ = list_to_integer(string:strip(UpTime, both, $\n)),
  803:                 {Registered, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["registeredusers"], Config),
  804: 
  805:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["onlineusersnode"], Config),
  806: 
  807:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats", ["onlineusers"], Config)
  808:         end).
  809: 
  810: stats_host(Config) ->
  811:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  812:                 RegisteredCount = length(escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config, [])),
  813:                 Registered = integer_to_list(RegisteredCount) ++ "\n",
  814: 
  815:                 PriDomain = escalus_client:server(Alice),
  816:                 SecDomain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain, Config),
  817: 
  818:                 {Registered, 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["registeredusers", PriDomain], Config),
  819:                 {"0\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["registeredusers", SecDomain], Config),
  820: 
  821:                 {"2\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["onlineusers", PriDomain], Config),
  822:                 {"0\n", 0} = ejabberdctl("stats_host", ["onlineusers", SecDomain], Config)
  823:         end).
  824:

  827: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  828: %% Improve coverage
  829: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  830: 
  831: 
  832: 
  833: simple_register(Config) ->
  834:     %% given
  835:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  836:     {Name, Password} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  837:     %% when
  838:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  839:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("registered_users", [Domain], Config),
  840:     %% then
  841:     {match, _} = re:run(R2, ".*(" ++binary_to_list(Name)++").*").
  842: 
  843: simple_unregister(Config) ->
  844:     %% given
  845:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  846:     {Name, _} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  847:     %% when
  848:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("unregister", [Name, Domain], Config),
  849:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("registered_users", [Domain], Config),
  850:     %% then
  851:     nomatch = re:run(R2, ".*(" ++binary_to_list(Name)++").*").
  852: 
  853: register_twice(Config) ->
  854:     %% given
  855:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  856:     {Name,  Password} = {<<"tyler">>, <<"durden">>},
  857:     %% when
  858:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  859:     {R, Code} = ejabberdctl("register", [Name, Domain, Password], Config),
  860:     %% then
  861:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".*(already registered).*"),
  862:     true = (Code =/= 0),
  863:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("unregister", [Name, Domain], Config).
  864: 
  865: 
  866: 
  867: backup_restore_mnesia(Config) ->
  868:     %% given
  869:     TableName = passwd,
  870:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  871:     io:format("Table size is ~n~p~n", [TableSize]),
  872:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  873:     FileName = "backup_mnesia.bup",
  874:     %% when
  875:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("backup", [FileName], Config),
  876:     nomatch = re:run(R, ".+"),
  877:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  878:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  879:     {R2, 0} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  880:     %% then
  881:     nomatch = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  882:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  883: 
  884: restore_mnesia_wrong(Config) ->
  885:     FileName = "file that doesnt exist13123.bup",
  886:     {R2, _} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  887:     {match, Code} = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  888:     true = (Code =/= 0).
  889: 
  890: dump_and_load(Config) ->
  891:     FileName = "dump.bup",
  892:     TableName = passwd,
  893:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  894:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  895:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("dump", [FileName], Config),
  896:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  897:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  898:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("load", [FileName], Config),
  899:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".+"),
  900:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  901: 
  902: load_mnesia_wrong(Config) ->
  903:     FileName = "file that doesnt existRHCP.bup",
  904:     {R2, Code} = ejabberdctl("restore", [FileName], Config),
  905:     {match, _} = re:run(R2, ".+"),
  906:     true = (Code =/= 0).
  907: 
  908: dump_table(Config) ->
  909:     FileName = "dump.mn",
  910:     TableName = passwd,
  911:     %% Table passwd should not be empty
  912:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  913:     {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("dump_table", [FileName, atom_to_list(TableName)], Config),
  914:     rpc_call(mnesia, clear_table, [TableName]),
  915:     0 = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]),
  916:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("load", [FileName], Config),
  917:     {match, _} = re:run(R, ".+"),
  918:     TableSize = rpc_call(mnesia, table_info, [TableName, size]).
  919: 
  920: get_loglevel(Config) ->
  921:     {R, 0} = ejabberdctl("get_loglevel", [], Config),
  922:     LogLevel = rpc_call(ejabberd_loglevel, get, []),
  923:     RegList = [io_lib:format("(.|\n|\r)*loglevel for ~p is ~p(.|\n|\r)*", [M, Lev]) || {M, {Lev, _}} <- LogLevel],
  924:     Regexp = lists:flatten(RegList),
  925:     Len = length(R),
  926:     {match, [{0, Len}]} = re:run(R, Regexp, [{capture, first}]).
  927: 
  928: remove_old_messages_test(Config) ->
  929:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(_) ->
  930:         %% given
  931:         JidA = nick_to_jid(alice, Config),
  932:         JidB = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  933:         JidRecordAlice = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidA]),
  934:         JidRecordBob = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidB]),
  935:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"bob@localhost">>, "Hi, how are you? Its old message!"),
  936:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"bob@localhost">>, "Hello its new message!"),
  937:         OldTimestamp = fallback_timestamp(10, now()),
  938:         OfflineOld = generate_offline_message(JidRecordAlice, JidRecordBob, Msg1, OldTimestamp),
  939:         OfflineNew = generate_offline_message(JidRecordAlice, JidRecordBob, Msg2, now()),
  940:         {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = JidRecordBob,
  941:         rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, write_messages, [LUser, LServer, [OfflineOld, OfflineNew]]),
  942:         %% when
  943:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_old_messages", ["1"], Config),
  944:         {ok, SecondList} = rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, pop_messages, [LUser, LServer]),
  945:         %% then
  946:         1 = length(SecondList)
  947:     end).
  948: 
  949: remove_expired_messages_test(Config) ->
  950:     escalus:story(Config, [{mike, 1}], fun(_) ->
  951:         %% given
  952:         JidA = nick_to_jid(mike, Config),
  953:         JidB = nick_to_jid(kate, Config),
  954:         JidRecordMike = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidA]),
  955:         JidRecordKate = rpc_call(jid, from_binary, [JidB]),
  956:         Msg1 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "Rolling stones"),
  957:         Msg2 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "Arctic monkeys!"),
  958:         Msg3 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "More wine..."),
  959:         Msg4 = escalus_stanza:chat_to(<<"kate@localhost">>, "kings of leon"),
  960:         OldTimestamp = fallback_timestamp(10, now()),
  961:         ExpirationTime = fallback_timestamp(2, now()),
  962:         ExpirationTimeFuture= fallback_timestamp(-5, now()),
  963:         OfflineOld = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg1, OldTimestamp, ExpirationTime),
  964:         OfflineNow = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg2, now(), ExpirationTime),
  965:         OfflineFuture = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg3, now(), ExpirationTimeFuture),
  966:         OfflineFuture2 = generate_offline_expired_message(JidRecordMike, JidRecordKate, Msg4, OldTimestamp, ExpirationTimeFuture),
  967:         {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = JidRecordKate,
  968:         rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, write_messages, [LUser, LServer, [OfflineOld, OfflineNow, OfflineFuture, OfflineFuture2]]),
  969:         %% when
  970:         {_, 0} = ejabberdctl("delete_expired_messages", [], Config),
  971:         {ok, SecondList} = rpc_call(mod_offline_backend, pop_messages, [LUser, LServer]),
  972:         %% then
  973:         2 = length(SecondList)
  974:     end).
  975: 
  976: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  977: %% Helpers
  978: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  979: 
  980: 
  981: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
  982:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
  983:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
  984: 
  985: generate_offline_message(From, To, Msg, TimeStamp) ->
  986:     {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = To,
  987:     #offline_msg{us = {LUser, LServer}, timestamp = TimeStamp, expire = never, from = From, to = To, packet = Msg}.
  988: 
  989: generate_offline_expired_message(From, To, Msg, TimeStamp, ExpirationTime) ->
  990:     {jid, _, _, _, LUser, LServer, _} = To,
  991:     #offline_msg{us = {LUser, LServer}, timestamp = TimeStamp, expire = ExpirationTime, from = From, to = To, packet = Msg}.
  992: 
  993: 
  994: fallback_timestamp(Days, {MegaSecs, Secs, _MicroSecs}) ->
  995:     S = MegaSecs * 1000000 + Secs - 60 * 60 * 24 * Days,
  996:     MegaSecs1 = S div 1000000,
  997:     Secs1 = S rem 1000000,
  998:     {MegaSecs1, Secs1, 0}.
  999: 
 1000: 
 1001: start_mod_admin_extra() ->
 1002:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 1003:     ok = dynamic_modules:restart(Domain, mod_admin_extra, []).
 1004: 
 1005: get_user_data(User, Config) when is_atom(User) ->
 1006:     get_user_data(escalus_users:get_options(Config, User, <<"newres">>), Config);
 1007: get_user_data(User, _Config) ->
 1008:     {_, Password} = lists:keyfind(password, 1, User),
 1009:     {_, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1010:     {_, Domain} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1011:     {Username, Domain, Password}.
 1012: 
 1013: get_md5(AccountPass) ->
 1014:     lists:flatten([io_lib:format("~.16B", [X])
 1015:                    || X <- binary_to_list(crypto:hash(md5, AccountPass))]).
 1016: get_sha(AccountPass) ->
 1017:     lists:flatten([io_lib:format("~.16B", [X])
 1018:                    || X <- binary_to_list(crypto:hash(sha, AccountPass))]).
 1019: 
 1020: set_last(User, Domain, TStamp) ->
 1021:     Mod = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_admin_extra_last, get_lastactivity_module, [Domain]),
 1022:     Fun = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_admin_extra_last, get_lastactivity_fun, [Domain]),
 1023:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(Mod, Fun, [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(User), Domain, TStamp, <<>>]).
 1024: 
 1025: delete_users(Config) ->
 1026:     Users = escalus_users:get_users({by_name, [alice, bob, kate, mike]}),
 1027:     lists:foreach(fun({_User, UserSpec}) ->
 1028:                 {Username, Domain, _Pass} = get_user_data(UserSpec, Config),
 1029:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, remove_user, [Username, Domain])
 1030:         end, Users).
 1031: 
 1032: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1033: %% Predicates
 1034: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1035: 
 1036: match_user_status(Users, StatusTxt) ->
 1037:     Statuses = string:tokens(StatusTxt, "\n"),
 1038: 
 1039:     true = (length(Users) == length(Statuses)),
 1040:     match_user_status2(Users, Statuses).
 1041: 
 1042: match_user_status2([], _) ->
 1043:     true;
 1044: match_user_status2([User | UserR], Statuses) ->
 1045:     Username = binary_to_list(escalus_client:username(User)),
 1046:     Domain = binary_to_list(escalus_client:server(User)),
 1047:     Resource = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(User)),
 1048: 
 1049:     true = lists:any(fun(Status) ->
 1050:                 [Username, Domain, Resource]
 1051:                 =:=
 1052:                 lists:sublist(string:tokens(Status, "\t"), 1, 3)
 1053:         end, Statuses),
 1054:     match_user_status2(UserR, Statuses).
 1055: 
 1056: match_user_info(Users, UsersTxt) ->
 1057:     UsersInfo = string:tokens(UsersTxt, "\n"),
 1058: 
 1059:     true = (length(Users) == length(UsersInfo)),
 1060:     match_user_info2(Users, UsersInfo).
 1061: 
 1062: match_user_info2([], _) ->
 1063:     true;
 1064: match_user_info2([User | UserR], UsersInfo) ->
 1065:     Username = binary_to_list(escalus_client:username(User)),
 1066:     Domain = binary_to_list(escalus_client:server(User)),
 1067:     Resource = binary_to_list(escalus_client:resource(User)),
 1068:     FullJID = Username ++ "@" ++ Domain ++ "/" ++ Resource,
 1069: 
 1070:     true = lists:any(fun(UserInfo) ->
 1071:                 string:str(UserInfo, string:to_lower(FullJID)) =:= 1
 1072:         end, UsersInfo),
 1073:     match_user_info2(UserR, UsersInfo).
 1074: 
 1075: match_roster(ItemsValid, Items) ->
 1076:     ItemsTokens = [ string:tokens(ItemToken, "\t") || ItemToken <- string:tokens(Items, "\n") ],
 1077: 
 1078:     true = (length(ItemsValid) == length(ItemsTokens)),
 1079:     true = lists:all(fun({Username, Domain, Nick, Group, Sub}) ->
 1080:                     JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(<<Username/binary, "@", Domain/binary >>),
 1081:                     lists:any(fun
 1082:                                 ([RosterJID, Nick, Sub, "none", Group]) ->
 1083:                                     JID =:= escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(list_to_binary(RosterJID));
 1084:                                 (_) ->
 1085:                                     false
 1086:                               end, ItemsTokens)
 1087:             end, ItemsValid).
 1088: 
 1089: string_to_binary(List) ->
 1090:     case erlang:system_info(otp_release) of
 1091:         [$R|_] ->
 1092:             list_to_binary(List);
 1093:         _ ->
 1094:             unicode:characters_to_binary(List)
 1095:     end.
